entry.title: Blvck 'Morose' Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 100.00

The Blvck 'Morose' Hoodie features a unique print at the back of the emblematic Blvck skull for a minimalist, streetwear look.

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, all our hoodies are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

Fits regular size for male.

The model is wearing XL and is 6ft 1in.

entry.title: Blvck Faded Rose Sweater
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 100.00

The 'Blvck Faded Rose Sweater' features a one-of-a-kind look with a Blvck skull holding a faded rose illustration, embroidered on the back of the sweater.

Made from 100% Terry Cotton, this limited edition sweater keeps you warm and stylish throughout your day. 

Limited supply.

Fits regular size. The model is 189cm and wears large.

entry.title: Blvck Oversized 'Sombre Desire' Tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Tees
Price: 105.00

The Blvck Oversized 'Sombre Desire' Tee features our logo in embroidery on the chest which gives a discrete and subtle look to the outfit. The back features a print of the Blvck Savanna, together with the Blvck signature logo. 

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, all our tees are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

Oversized Fit.

Model is wearing a size XL and is 6ft 1in.

entry.title: Blvck Monogram Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 120.00

Part of BLVCK03, our 'Blvck Monogram Hoodie' is embellished all over with the BLVCK Oblique motif and features a logo on the hood that gives a defining look to any outfit.

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, all our hoodies are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

Fits regular size.

The model is wearing L and is 1m86.

entry.title: Blvck x Memeland Skull tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Tees
Price: 90.00

Featuring the distinguished skull artwork in rubber print on the front and 'Blvck Paris' branding on the rear, the 'Blvck x Memeland Skull Tee’ adds a subtle style to your wardrobe. Constructed from a premium blend of combed cotton, it is amazingly soft and provides a comfortable and relaxed fit for any occasion.

This garment presents an oversized fit.

entry.title: Blvck x Memeland Essential Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 160.00

Elevate your appearance with the 'Blvck x Memeland Essential Hoodie'. The front boasts the iconic Memeland logo in rubber print, while the back showcases a modern take on the 'Blvck Paris' logo in pixelated rubber print.

Crafted from a luxurious blend of fleece cotton, it's impossibly soft to the touch and lends a perfect fit for whichever activity the day may bring.

This piece boasts an oversized fit.

entry.title: Blvck x Memeland Coins Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 160.00

Featuring the Memeland logo in rubber print on the front, the Blvck x Memeland 'Coins' Hoodie offers a discreetly stylish way to keep your meme coins close.

The back displays a revamped pixelated 'Blvck Paris' logo in rubber print.

Crafted from a luxurious blend of fleece cotton, it's impossibly soft to the touch and lends a perfect fit for whichever activity the day may bring.

This piece boasts an oversized fit.

entry.title: Blvck x Memeland 'Finger' Tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Tees
Price: 90.00

This tee is a limited edition, specially created to commemorate the launch of our collaboration at ComplexCon.

The Blvck x Memeland 'Finger' Tee adds a touch of sophistication and playful humor to your daily outfit with its cleverly concealed middle finger embroidered inside the chest pocket.
This product features a dark grey embroidery artwork on combed cotton, along with black rubber print logos.

Oversized fit

Unisex.

entry.title: Blvck Reversible Bucket Hat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Headwear
Price: 60.00

Channeling a Blvck summer style, the Blvck Branded Bucket hat is reversible with one minimalistic side with the Blvck logo on it and the other side full monogram in UV glossy black for an effortlessly cool feel. It's detailed with black logo straps

One size fits most. Comes with a size adjuster.

100% Nylon.

entry.title: Whte Bold Stripe Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Whte Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 120.00

Part of the Whte01 Collection, the 'Bold Stripe Hoodie' features a unique extended stripe across the chest/arms with the Whte Logo printed across the sleeve.chest for a minimalist, streetwear look.

Made from luxurious terry & fleece cotton, all our hoodies are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

Unisex fit. Fits regular size for men.

entry.title: Blvck Reversible Puffer Coat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Outerwear
Price: 400.00

Introducing the 'Blvck Reversible Puffer Coat', this jacket is filled with down feather to provide unparalleled warmth and an investment which you will re-wear season after season.

The coat is reversible with one minimalistic all black side and the other side embellished with monograms all over the jacket and has a reflective black UV gloss. 

Washing care: Hand Wash or Dry clean 

Inner: 90% Duck Down, 10% Polyester 

We recommend taking a size up your usual size. 

The model is wearing L and is 1m86.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 120.00

'The Blvck Enchanted Hoodie' features the Signature Snake Illustration in embroidery all over the shoulders that adds a defining look to any outfit.

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, all our hoodies are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

 Fits Regular Size for men.

entry.title: Blvck Minimalist Sweats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Pants
Price: 110.00

The 'Bold Minimalist Sweats' features an embroidered BLVCK logo on the outside of the front leg with a branded Blvck drawstring to give you the ultimate Blvck experience. These sweatpants are warm and perfect for a casual, laidback day.

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, our sweatpants are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

Fits regular size.

entry.title: Blvck Verse Hoodie
entry.summary:

Price: 100.00

The 'Blvck Verse Hoodie' features a unique Roses artwork piece on the back of the hoodie with an extract from a poem from french poet, Paul Verlaine and a simple Blvck logo on the chest for a minimalist, streetwear look.

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, all our hoodies are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

Fits true to size.


The model is 1.87cm and wears a size Large.

Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 120.00

 The Blvck Gradient Sweater titillates the eyes with its subtle ombré, featuring a spectrum from dark to light grey, and a nonchalant, roomy silhouette.

Crafted from french terry cotton, it lends a perfect fit for whichever activity the day may bring.

entry.title: Blvck Mohair Jacket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Hoodies & Sweaters
Price: 160.00

Presenting the Blvck Mohair Jacket, a sophisticated and cozy masterpiece crafted with the most exquisite mohair fabric for a superior touch and feel. 

Boasting a metallic plate bearing the iconic Blvck Paris logo for an opulent aesthetic, this jacket exudes luxury.

For a soft touch and luxe touch, look no further than this timeless must-have. 

Oversized Fit.

10% mohair, 90% nylon

entry.title: Blvck Monogram MacBook Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: High-Tech
Price: 60.00

With the Blvck Monogram MacBook Skin, your device will never look the same. Made from premium materials, and laser cut to offer the best fit the Blvck MacBook Skin adds a touch of elegance to an otherwise generic design.

Upgrade your lifestyle today and wrap your MacBook in our luxurious Blvck MacBook Skin! 

Please note that this is a skin that you apply as a sticker to your MacBook (not a case) and that a spacing of 1-2mm may be visible on the edges once applied.

Package Included
-One top body skin Cover
-One keyboard/trackpad surround cover
-One bottom skin Cover

entry.title: Blvck x PSG Scarf
entry.summary:

The 'Blvck X PSG' scarf features unmistakable logos of the renowned brands, artfully crafted in a timeless silhouette with finely tailored edges in a stunning monochromatic hue. Sumptuously crafted from wool, this piece of apparel affords exceptional comfort and warmth.

200*32cm
